plot: A short documentary about a young man from Nova Scotia who has given up his apartment, car and cell phone to live and travel the world on a 46 year old wooden boat.
title: Twenty Eight Feet: Life on a Little Wooden Boat
plot_es: A short documentary about a young man from Nova Scotia who has given up his apartment, car and cell phone to live and travel the world on a 46 year old wooden boat.
original_name: Twenty Eight Feet: Life on a Little Wooden Boat
plot_en: A short documentary about a young man from Nova Scotia who has given up his apartment, car and cell phone to live and travel the world on a 46 year old wooden boat.
